| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Bug fix?      | Yes or No
| New feature?  | Yes or No
| BC breaks?    | Yes or No
| Deprecations? | Yes or No
| Fixed tickets | N/A or xx

> Do not forget to add notes about your changes to [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/deployphp/recipes/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
